data.description:
Are you ready to play music for a crowd going crazy for you?

ROCK, PLAY and PERFORM 25 great official songs with more to come! 

Embark on this unique musical journey that will have you living the ultimate SUPERSTAR experience!

Key Features
- Unique gameplay: play music by shooting, punching and moving notes!
- Play 25 great official songs with four difficulties and many modifiers.
- Electrify your audience by performing in 5 out of this world stages!
- Find your sound tone by trying the 4 different instrument sounds included
- Discover great music from our growing library and amazing collaborations with artists
- Witness yourself climb up the leaderboards as you master your skills and performance

Are you ready to ROCK the world with Musical Range? Grab your headset, feel the music and become a SUPERSTAR!

changelog.change_log:
Added Custom Song Support to Musical Range.
Add your custom songs to [YourQuestDeviceName]\Internal shared storage\Android\data\Rockhopper.MusicalRange.Alpha\files\UE4Game\MusicalRange\MusicalRange\Content\CustomSongs\

Added Ottava lines based on star score at the end of a song.

Added a Basic Info for Custom Songs on the Song Select Menu if the user has no Custom songs.
Song Select Menu to displays messages while looking for songs.

Discord Link is now a press button anywhere it is displayed. It will open a web browser.

Updated Tutorial to offer more info when it waits for certain actions.

Adjusted shooting particle light intensity

Updated Tone Change effects.

Fixed Crystal Butterfly Stage far crowds.
